chapters.summary: Hi, Anthony Spigen. How we doing? Hi buddy. I'm on the road still, buddy. Just want to find out a bit more about you, get a better feel for your goals and where you're at. I'll then run through sort of our program, what we do, what's involved.
chapters.headline: Sam Atlas to Anthony Spigen: How are you doing buddy

chapters.summary: I feel like my diet's not good enough and I want to understand a lot more. Just in general look out, looking after myself and get myself and you know, good, good health, that's the main priority mates.
chapters.headline: So what is your main goal with regards to your health this year

chapters.summary: Anthony specializes in helping guys over 40 to lose weight, get fit and improve the health. It's group personal training with other guys in a very similar place to yourself. Along the way we're going to hold you accountable.
chapters.headline: Anthony specializes in helping guys over 40 to lose weight and improve health

chapters.summary: We do a six week transformation program which is £199, or you can go straight into our monthly program, £110amonth. Is there a good time, like later today, for example? Give us a call.
chapters.headline: You can start with a six week transformation program or go straight into monthly

chapters.summary: Farnley Gardens, Sutton in the forest. The payment won't come out until Monday anyway, so nothing's going to be billed today. Minimum three month commitment. Thereafter, it ends a 30 day rolling membership. Just train as long as it makes sense to yourself.
